thread.title: Anushka Sharma Starts Her Morning By Casting Her Vote In The BMC Elections 2017
thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma Starts Her Morning By Casting Her Vote In The BMC Elections 2017

title: Anushka Sharma Starts Her Morning By Casting Her Vote In The BMC Elections 2017
text: facebook While many of us shun our responsibilities as citizens of the country, our Bollywood stars make sure that they play their part in making the nation a better place to live in. In that spirit, actress Anushka Sharma started the day by casting her vote in the BMC elections 2017. Started my morning by casting my https://t.co/Z817hxXwb7 is our duty towards our country & its progress.Pls go out&vote #VoteKarMaharashtra pic.twitter.com/fgXGxjkEcV â€” Anushka Sharma (@AnushkaSharma) February 21, 2017 That said, people came out in large numbers to cast their vote for the cash-rich Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation elections (yes, that is what BMC stands for) happening in Maharashtra today. There are preparations in place to hold the elections across 277 electoral wards, at 1582 places. The number of polling booths set up is 7304. State Election Commissioner, J.S. Saharia, told reporters in Mumbai that the machinery is geared up to ensure fair voting. He also shared that, "3.77 crore voters are eligible to decide the fate of 17,331 candidates in rural and urban areas, including Mumbai." Hope that puts things in perspective.
